Authors:
Nimali Indeewari de Silva, Kevin D Hyde, Saisamorn
Lumyong
Title:
Morphology and phylogeny of Atrocalyx acervatus sp. nov.
(Lophiotremataceae) from Acer species with taxonomic update on
Lophiotrema species
Abstract:
New species of Atrocalyx (Lophiotremataceae) was collected
from dead branches of Acer species in Yunnan Province, China. This is
the first record of Atrocalyx occurred on Acer. Lophiotrema bambusae and
Lophiotrema guttulata is transferred to Atrocalyx based on combined SSU,
ITS, LSU and tef1 sequences analyses.
